items.title: How to Start a Livestream
items.description: A step-by-step video showing how to set up OBS, cameras, and scheduled YouTube livestreams for SMHS events.

items.title: How to Start a Livestream (manually)
items.description:
A step-by-step video to start a livestream with OBS, while using the YouTube website. 
*Try this if the app is bugging.*
